Forum structureÂ¶

There is one forum for Purdue, and three forums for Bogota, and three forums for Platzi. In each hack type we can extend the number of forums from the admin interface.

The posts and discussions from one forum are not visible to the users from the other forums.

+--------------------+-----------+-----------+
|       Purdue       |  Bogota   |   Plazi   |
+--------------------+-----------+-----------+
|         0          | 0 | 1 | 2 | 0 | 1 | 2 |
+--------------------+-----------+-----------+
|                    |   |   |   |   |   |   |
...
